name: The Mirror of Truth
description:
The mirror of truth Synopsis

Legend has it that there exists a mirror capable of revealing the truth to anyone looking through it.

A ancient king found the mirror but did not like what he saw in it so he shattered the mirror and hid the pieces.

In search of truth about yourself, you start gathering information about where the mirror could be. You quickly learn that it was broken in 6 pieces so you set on an adventure to gather the pieces of the mirror to finally be able to understand who you really are.

Controls
  • Move: W, A
  • Jump: Space
  • Advance text: E
Background

This game was developed for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022 in one week, everything was done entirely from scratch.

The theme was "It is not real"

Credits

Loïc "Metalfox Dioxymore" Parra: Programming / Music

Clément "Piou" Lardenois: Art / Animations
